name: MOCKTROID
description:
Space Pirates have invaded the frontier world of Rectrix III and disrupted a science mission ordered by the Stellar Order of Unionised Planets. Take control of the Gunslinger, a bounty hunter hired by S.O.U.P for an outlandish price to locate the science team and eliminate the pirate threat.

Explore the decaying ruins of Rectrix III and use whatever technology may be conveniently lying around to determine the fate of the science team and blast the Space Pirates off the face of the planet...... Oh and maybe save the planet from its impending destruction, but you weren’t paid for that so only if you have time. 

 This is a vertical slice that was produced for the XB3992 Honours Project module.
